Detailed Description

a callback-stack for use in nesting/branching expectations in a conversation

Field Documentation

upk_net_callback_t _upk_net_cb_stk::msg_handlers

the array of callback handlers for each type of message, set the appropriate bucket with the function that handles the type of messages you expect next. Use the macro UPK_MSGTYPE_IDX(msgtype) to find the appropriate bucket

Referenced by init_callback_handlers(), and upk_call_received_packet_callbacks().

upk_net_callback_t _upk_net_cb_stk::net_dispatch_foreach

run this for every message

Referenced by upk_net_event_dispatcher().

upk_net_callback_t _upk_net_cb_stk::net_dispatch_post

run this after dispatching to a handler

Referenced by upk_net_event_dispatcher().

upk_net_callback_t _upk_net_cb_stk::net_dispatch_pre

before dispatching the event to the handler in msg_handlers

Referenced by upk_net_event_dispatcher().
